content: उपद्रुत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Visited by calamities, oppressed, attacked, infested; वेदनाभिरुपद्रुतं <ls>H. 4. 88.</ls> {@--2@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) Eclipsed. {@--3@} Boding evil, inauspicious. --तं A term used by the Bāṣkalas for a kind of Saṃdhi, also called उद्ग्राहवत् <ab>q. v.</ab>
